mapper.select: select r2.usr_id, r2.usr_nm, r2.usr_sex, r2.usr_birth, r2.usr_addr, r2.usr_hp, r2.usr_auth_cd, r2.reg_date, r2.usr_no from( select usr_no, rownum as rnum from ( SELECT usr_no FROM ck_usr order by reg_date desc ) )r1, ck_usr r2 where r1.usr_no = r2.usr_no and rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by r2.reg_date DESC
